name: Bike Fight - Demolition Derby
description:
Futuristic Demolition - Bike Racing Derby Fight brings you a deadly derby bike battle where smashing bikes & firing missiles will knock out your derby opponents. It’s time to win extreme derby stunts war in derby demolition bike battle and experience furious driving and crash racing. Experience extreme derby bike stunts in fast death racing game where you will crash derby rivals. Experience the real thrill of fast driving, drift racing and demolition derby war destruction in real Futuristic Demolition - Bike Racing Derby Fight. The weaponized derby bike has the power to fire missile to distant opponents so you can quickly win the wars racing tournament. As a real demolition derby racer, hit hard and open rapid fire to damage your opponents’ vehicles.

It’s time for reckless drive and fire rapid missile to wipeout the rivals in epic bike battle show. Make your engine roar, show massive jumps, dodge the opponents, cross the hurdles in incredible bike racing battle. Speed up your derby and show daredevil driving skills in derby demolition racing adventure. Bash to crash derby with extreme stunts in thrilling gameplay. Drive at furious speed as a reckless driver and use rapid gun fire to crash derby rivals into pieces. Drive the weaponized derby in extreme racing stunt drive and let no other win the thrilling bike stunt show.

Futuristic Demolition - Bike Racing Derby Fight is full of action and adventure where breathtaking bike stunts and extreme bike driving inside war arena will make you the real superhero derby bike driver. Will you be able to survive in deadly demolition mania? Become the last survivor in Demolition Derby - Extreme bike Stunts Wars where extreme shooting, hits, smash, crash and reckless drive will make you the real stunts man driver in deadly bike battle. Exhibit best racing and driving skills and wreck into other bikes. Survive in the deadly battle arena as long as you can and see the real-time bike destruction in death racing extreme stunt wars.

Features:
+ Crash & smash the bikes inside arena!
+ Battle against multiple opponents!
+ Survive the deadly demolition derby war!
+ Destruction, fire, hurdles, jumps, crash & bike stunts!
+ Extreme bike stunts driving and crash racing!
+ Realistic bike physics and smooth controls!
+ Amazing 3D graphics and best sound effects!
